entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Chesterfield
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:06 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -38.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chesterfield Inlet Airport 3:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023
Condition: Blowing Snow
Temperature: -38.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -58
Dewpoint: -42.4°C
Wind: WNW 36 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 43.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing overnight. Blowing snow at times this evening. Wind west 40 km/h. Low minus 43. Wind chill minus 58 this evening and minus 63 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023
